mapper.select: SELECT o.user_id AS userId, oi.product_id AS productId, oi.amount AS quantity, COALESCE(p.product_name, '상품명 없음') AS productName, oi.price AS price, COALESCE(p.image_url, '') AS imageUrl FROM bg_order_item oi LEFT JOIN bg_product p ON oi.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN bg_order o ON oi.order_id = o.id WHERE oi.order_id = #{orderId}
